title: Riot Pls: Ranked Pls - 2017 Season Ranked Changes

replies.body:
Hey Rito, how is this going to work in OCE? We have the smallest server population, surely we can't have both queues straight off the bat without queue times being an incredibly long time? I'm silver 2 and already have to wait 5-6 minutes(I queue jg/mid primary) average to find a game(in ranked).

Thanks

Another way to shorten your queue times just like i do every...
single...
game...

Hey Tacostrom, great question!  

We're committed to getting as much open as we can on OCE, but you are right in recognizing that there may be issues with queue times.  In an ideal world we'll have both open all the time, but we'll likely be launching with one of the queues open for specific windows during peak hours.
Im scanning the post for the usual "None of this will be avaliable on OCE"
Solo/Duo Queue??? Suit up boys, I'm coming back to league!
{{item:3083}} {{summoner:6}}
I love the reference <3{{champion:55}}
{{champion:103}} OCE server is the smallest server in the world!!!!
But we have the best people amirite ;)
{{champion:105}} {{summoner:14}} {{item:3100}} hahah GJ
Googled it, OCE is the 3rd smallest server.
Oh yeah didn't read that before I wrote my other reply oops
I thought Turkey was... xD

Ehh, I actually liked dynamic queue, it promoted teamwork. Solo queue is just a free for all, with no attempt at coordination.
Who needs teamwork in a team game, am I right or amirite?

i feel the same way, Solo Queue needs to die. And those arguing for it need to move on. It's a relic from a different time.

Admittedly i do understand the need for it at the highest level to reduce queue times but still, Solo Queue is a goddamn relic
Well I'm glad you guys enjoy playing against a 5-man premade when you are playing solo so you just lose due to the fact you're not playing with 4 other people :D

well id say more that when those people who rank higher cause they 5 man then they start to solo
generally they still play like a lower elo player...so its a massive win for me
the thing is that in dynamic queue there are people who just hog one position that they think theyre good at. Also dynamic queue has too big of a queue time
Flex queue is the one for you then =D
{{summoner:11}} lol

"Solo queue is just a free for all" - JoshuaRS. 
That's a joke right?

it is ment for that.....if you 5 man in solo queue yeh you would wana hope so but what bout the guy who solos and gets put in with 4 others...generaly those 4 others couldn't make even close the rank they got to this season...generally when those people decide to solo in dynamic queue they arugue kick scream and act like they in low elo........ im EXTREMELY happy that they canning the 5 man into solo queue, this dynamic queue has pushed away a lot of my friends gold plat and diamond elo(last season) from playing the game...

Hi Team, been playing LOL since S3 but only really just started playing ranked.  Is there anything in the algorithm to help us avoid toxic players? I'm probably on the older side of the demographic and I don't mind being matched with unskilled players. I just can't handle being told to "F-myself" 4 times before the game even starts. Anything in the 2017 for us?

This new ranked queue thing is pathetic, so now players will have to win gold on both the queues to even get the proper season rewards? If this ranked thing comes out for a while, i doubt people would start to waste anymore time in ranked, as alot of people play the current solo queue and already use up alot of time ranking up on that to even get a better elo, so i think people wwouldnt really want to waste more time onto playing the flex queue and waste more time, this system here that you guys are adding in will just ruin playing ranked, why not just add in the same ranked system from Season 5 rather than add something that'll make people waste more time on it to receive the full reward, whereas in season 5/6 people only had to play one ranked queue and received the full reward from that? i think this new ranked queue thing will ruin league's ranking system and stop people from playing ranked for a while as it'll waste people's more time to even receive the proper rewards. i know Riot considers peoples opinions but they need to consider the peoples play style and not add something into that game that will ruin the fun of trying to reach a higher elo to get the proper rewards, rather than introducing a new system that'll make people have to  waste more time and more work to even get anything rewarding.
no, you dont have to get to gold in both to get the rewards you get atm, you get an EXTRA (not part of what we get atm) for being gold in both queues
Are you ever going to bring Normal (Draft Pick) to OCE? NA already has it and it'd be nice if we had it as well.
PLEASE DO THIS! There are so many toxic people in normal games because someone could press ctrl + V first, it just ruins the game for everyone.

personally i think its about time Normal queue just gets replaced with draft pick. Its a better system. Ban times at least reduces the number of instalockers, Bans mean if you instant tilt when facing say, lee sin, you can just ban him.

Its just overall better than Normal queue, normal queue is the MOST toxic of all the queues LoL has. (In-match however that honor goes to low level ranked)
I feel like they'll try, but at a fraction of the server pop of NA, queue times would be HUGE.
Well.. RIP the main reason I enjoy this game. It was a good run ranked teams.

Correct me if im wrong but this means i cant que up with my usual 3 man and if so why are we punished because people are "tilted" by vsing premades? Its not our fault and its a team game any way so what diffirence does it make?
You can queue up as a 3 man, but only in the Flex queue, not the solo/duo queue.

> Emblems were a band-aid solution, not a permanent fix.

They didn't really do anything...
is there a reason why Normals blind pick cant be replaced with Normals draft pick
Because nobody wants to wait 10 mintues to play a normal game

There wouldnt be a 10 minute wait, REPLACING with draft, not having both. The only reason draft had a long queue time was that it run WITH Blind pick.

Draft pick is just better and should replace Blind, if they like the idea of blind though, just use the Blind Draft they use for some of the game modes
id say its worth the wait, and it makes it way easier to jump into ranked after hitting level 30

I don't understand the need to bring back solo/duo queue. League of Legends players are so precious, and by the end of it i'm sure most people had gotten used to it (that were complaining about dynamic queue before). All it does is divide the playerbase into two types of people - people that play with their friends and people that want to "solo" carry. I dont understand the need for a solo queue at all, seeing as this is a team game and pretty much every team orientated game apart from league has a queue where you can queue up any amount of people. Encouraging solo queues encourage a solo mentality and hence where I think the toxicity that league is so known for is known to bloom. It doesn't make sense to encourage a solo queue in a team game where the efforts of all 5 are what pulls the W out, not just one hard carry where everyone that queues up thinks they will hard carry.
Riot, does my current rank effect my season 7 placement games? Will it make me get a lower rank even if i get good wins?
Rito, Does our season 6 rank affect our new season 7 promo games and what rank we will end up in?

Just wondering, Wouldn't it be a good idea to also add draft pick for Norms like not replacing Blind but just adding it as well?
I mean i think it would be better (better practice as well as better Quality) in some situations
When they say go back to something like the 2015 season, but people like me are sitting over here not knowing what ranked in 2015 was like.... FeelsBadMan{{champion:103}}
So will you have two different ranks on your profile if you play both queue types?
when does it start ?{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

is there any thought to just make 'ranked' queue pure solo???
surely this is the best option and ensures integrity of ladder and fixes all te match making dramas too?

there are enough other game modes to enjoy with friends so ranked can be solo..

just my thoughts.. =)

So you can only have fun with your friends on weekends when some of the gamemodes are terrible anyway... (Ill rephrase) So people can only have fun with you friends every 3-4 weeks or in normals? -_- 

But isn't league a team game~~~~~ Also by what i have seen is only a small minority of players with large audiences speaking out against dynamic queue and the majority not speaking out because dynamic queue was great?

just my thoughts.. =)
anyone want to duo???????????{{champion:55}} {{summoner:14}} {{item:3041}}
